text: dēva granthaya denu læbūvanaṭa num̆ba sǣma sādhakayakma gena hærapǣva da ovuhu num̆bagē kiblā (diśāva) anugamanaya nokaḷaha. esēma num̆ba da ovungē kiblā va anugamanaya karanneku novē. tavada ovungen samahareku samaharekugē kiblāva anugamanaya karannan noveti. tavada num̆baṭa gnānaya pæmiṇi pasuva num̆ba ovungē manō āśāvan anugamanaya kaḷehi nam eviṭa niyata vaśayenma num̆ba aparādhakaruvan aturin vannehiya
